sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Tabs from "react-bootstrap/Tabs"; import Tab from "react-bootstrap/Tab"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row"; import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col"; import FloatingLabel from "react-bootstrap/FloatingLabel"; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; import FileUpload from "../FileUpload"; import { Formik } from "formik"; import * as yup from "yup"; const schema = yup.object().shape({ projectName: yup.string().required(), projectDescription: yup.string(), duration: yup.number().required(), cost: yup.number().required(), }); const AddProject = (props) => { return ( {({ handleSubmit, handleChange, handleBlur, values, touched, isValid, errors, }) => (
Add Project Project Name {errors.projectName}

Client Name Project Code Team Lead Project Manager
Team Members: 0 {" "} {/*Team Members: {props.team/lenth}*/}
Timesheet Approval Type Expense Approval Type
Project Description {errors.projectDescription} Duration (Hours) Duration must be a number! Project Estimated Cost Cost must be a number! Project Status Project Code
Start Date Due Date Project Template
{/* */} {/* https://www.primefaces.org/primereact/showcase/#/fileupload */}
)} ); }; export default AddProject;
